description:
Paris' $1.5BN cleanup plan is in-seine.
Learn more about LARQ - https://bylarq.com/B1M 

For more by The B1M subscribe now - https://bit.ly/the-b1m

https://www.sortiraparis.com/en/what-to-do-in-paris/sport-wellness/articles/143669-paris-plages-2023-free-pools-at-the-bassin-de-la-villette

title: The $1BN Plan to Fix Paris’ Dirty Secret
